svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/28.1.2 Chrome/138.0.7204.243 Electron/37.4.0 Safari/537.36" version="28.1.2"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="96JOmvi1PGZhWMS_gISH"> <mxGraphModel dx="1900" dy="767" grid="0" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="0" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" background="none" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="A1tDQoWvBGvfI_LFQjFn-1" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">开始</font>" style="html=1;dashed=0;whiteSpace=wrap;shape=mxgraph.dfd.start;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="A1tDQoWvBGvfI_LFQjFn-2" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">系统和外设初始化</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="80" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="A1tDQoWvBGvfI_LFQjFn-3" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="60" y="40" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="60" y="80" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="A1tDQoWvBGvfI_LFQjFn-4" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">外设A需要处理?</font>" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-10" y="170" width="140" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="A1tDQoWvBGvfI_LFQjFn-5" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="60" y="120" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="60" y="170" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="A1tDQoWvBGvfI_LFQjFn-7" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">处理A</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="140" y="220" width="80" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="A1tDQoWvBGvfI_LFQjFn-8" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="130" y="195" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="180" y="220" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="180" y="195" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="A1tDQoWvBGvfI_LFQjFn-9" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">是</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="125" y="170" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="A1tDQoWvBGvfI_LFQjFn-10" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">否</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="35" y="215" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="A1tDQoWvBGvfI_LFQjFn-11" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;startArrow=blockThin;startFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> id="A1tDQoWvBGvfI_LFQjFn-12" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="59.8" y="220" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="60" y="270" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="A1tDQoWvBGvfI_LFQjFn-14" value="<font style="font-size: 20px;">用于包含多个需要处理的设备的应用程序的轮询方法</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-115" y="485" width="480" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="3iKqr8CXhCXycDQRTXyZ-1" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">外设B需要处理?</font>" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-10" y="270" width="140" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="3iKqr8CXhCXycDQRTXyZ-3"
